channel.title: Exile-Coding Community**~link approved proof
channel.description:
proof:[quote="Bebemycat2"][quote author=mod robby link=action=profile;u=70305 date=1182236383] As Frell did i want my Link aproved also. Here it is http://exilescape.co.nr i am just making a online community for some projects and such. No biggie... So what do you say? [/quote] Approved.[/quote]
[center][img]http://7.uploadmirror.com/uploaded/1/708/banner_break_06_17_2007_00_55_11_79078.gif[/img][/center]
We are a coding community friendly with all coders. We don't care if you don't know what client.java is its a place to learn all of that. Just like MoparScape We deal with all Private server coding except RSC coding. We also added a tab back to moparscape.
Q: Why Join? A: Because its a good learning expiriance and if you code good you have a good chance of becoming a member of the staff.
Q: What goes on there? A: We have projects that go on for good coders. Share coding infomation with other members of the forum. Join the Unofficial ExileScape Server: RS-palace(Coded by -legend-).
[b][color=red]SORRY THERE IS A REGISTERING ERROR YOU MUST when registering hit enter after filling out the form and not hitting register button because the register button is broken :|[/b]
Enjoy [size=50pt]LINK: http://exilescape.co.nr/smf[/size]

item.title: Exile-Coding Community**~link approved proof
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“Wildfire, post:6, topic:113165”]Still not working, and I was going to change password upon signing on. It doesn’t allow you to click continue.[/quote]hold on pm me a new pass and i will fix the error in the prossess

[b][color=red]SORRY THERE IS A REGISTERING ERROR YOU MUST PM ME THAT YOU WANT AN ACCOUNT AND I’LL GIVE You the pass and you log in and then change pass![br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 08:55:53 PM[/size][hr]Yeah the error is going to be fixed when i get home from school today sorry faitful users

Read full topic

item.title: Exile-Coding Community**~link approved proof
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

proof:[quote=“Bebemycat2”][quote author=mod robby link=action=profile;u=70305 date=1182236383]
As Frell did i want my Link aproved also. Here it is http://exilescape.co.nr i am just making a online community for some projects and such. No biggie… So what do you say?
[/quote]
Approved.[/quote]

[center][/center]

We are a coding community friendly with all coders. We don’t care if you don’t know what client.java is its a place to learn all of that. Just like MoparScape We deal with all Private server coding except RSC coding. We also added a tab back to moparscape.

Q: Why Join? A: Because its a good learning expiriance and if you code good you have a good chance of becoming a member of the staff.

Q: What goes on there? A: We have projects that go on for good coders. Share coding infomation with other members of the forum. Join the Unofficial ExileScape Server: RS-palace(Coded by -legend-).

[color=red]SORRY THERE IS A REGISTERING ERROR YOU MUST when registering hit enter after filling out the form and not hitting register button because the register button is broken

Enjoy
[size=50pt]LINK: http://exilescape.co.nr/smf[/size]

Read full topic
